ValidationRule.description:
BODEV-1668: Validation rule to ensure Portal URL entered without http:// nor https://
2022-09-08 Deactivated as Portal URL can be synced from Mavenlink with http:// or https://, which could cause validation error on later updates.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), OR( CONTAINS( Portal_URL__c , "http://"), CONTAINS( Portal_URL__c , "https://") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter Portal URL without http:// or https://
